welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jarinu, Brazil! Get ready to fall in love with our charming city, known for its breathtaking natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Jarinu has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
